name: Shoot Inside a Room is Dangerous
name_original: Shoot Inside a Room is Dangerous
description:
Shoot inside a room is DANGEROUS is about Nakie, an old woman that must to rescue his grandson from Yakishoba Mafia.

Grand Yaki Boss says that Nakie's grandson is a bad guy.

Nakie says: "My grandson is... MY GRANDSON!!!!" RATATATATATATATATA!!!!

And then the game starts :).

You must fight into the Yakishoba Tower elevator against hordes of gentlemen armed with guns and uzis, but be careful!: shoot inside a room is DANGEROUS.

PD: Sometimes, Nakie forget to dress.

CONTROLS

Keyboard + Mouse
WASD: Move
Mouse: Rotate (aim)
Left Click: Shoot!

XBOX 360 Pad PC and Linux
Left Stick: Move
Right Stick: Rotate (aim)
RT: Shoot!
